title: Other Fixed Water Containers
introduction: Two zones (Zones 0 and 2) are classified for fixed water containers other than baths and showers:

zones.definition: Zone 0 shall be the area of the interior of the water container.

containers.conditions: for an individual water container with a capacity not exceeding 40 L, and having fixed water outlets
limits: the vertical plane 0.15 m from the internal rim of the water container
the floor and the horizontal plane 0.4 m above the water container
notes: Figure 6.13 shows a typical double bowl sink where the capacity of each container does not exceed 40 L.

containers.conditions: for water containers having either a capacity exceeding 40 L, or a water outlet through a flexible hose
limits: the vertical plane 0.5 m from the internal rim of the water container
the floor and the horizontal plane 1.0 m above the water container

notes: There is no Zone 1 or 3 for these water containers.
An example of a water outlet through a flexible hose is a vegetable sprayer.
reference: Examples of these zones are shown in Figures 6.13 and 6.14.
